1.name: Pet Sematary II
1.description: A teenage boy and his father move to his recently-deceased mother's hometown, where they encounter the ancient Native American cemetery with the power to raise the dead.

2.name: Reservoir Dogs
2.description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

3.name: All Ladies Do It
3.description: A happily married 24-year-old woman who experiences an inexplicable, rather restless craving to finally live her life intensely, retells her extra-marital escapades to her husband intending to spice up their marriage.

4.name: Basic Instinct
4.description: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder, in which a manipulative and seductive novelist could be involved.

5.name: Batman Returns
5.description: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

6.name: A Few Good Men
6.description: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

7.name: Dracula
7.description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

8.name: Aladdin
8.description: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

9.name: Unforgiven
9.description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

10.name: Scent of a Woman
10.description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

11.name: Alien³
11.description: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.

12.name: My Cousin Vinny
12.description: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

13.name: The Last of the Mohicans
13.description: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

14.name: The Mighty Ducks
14.description: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

15.name: Wayne's World
15.description: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

16.name: Under Siege
16.description: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

17.name: Sister Act
17.description: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

18.name: A League of Their Own
18.description: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

19.name: The Bodyguard
19.description: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

20.name: Death Becomes Her
20.description: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

21.name: Beethoven
21.description: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

22.name: Army of Darkness
22.description: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

23.name: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
23.description: A young FBI agent disappears while investigating a murder miles from Twin Peaks that may be related to the future murder of Laura Palmer; the last week of the life of Laura Palmer is chronicled.

24.name: Chaplin
24.description: A movie about the troubled and controversial life of the master comedy filmmaker Charlie Chaplin.

25.name: Candyman
25.description: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

26.name: The Crying Game
26.description: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

27.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
27.description: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

28.name: The Lawnmower Man
28.description: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

29.name: Bitter Moon
29.description: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

30.name: Patriot Games
30.description: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

31.name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
31.description: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

32.name: Newsies
32.description: A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.

33.name: Sleepwalkers
33.description: A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures move to a small town to seek out a young virgin to feed on.

34.name: White Men Can't Jump
34.description: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

35.name: Single White Female
35.description: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

36.name: Poison Ivy
36.description: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

37.name: Malcolm X
37.description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

38.name: School Ties
38.description: Set in the 1950s, a star-quarterback is given an opportunity to attend an elite preparatory school but must conceal the fact that he is Jewish.

39.name: Glengarry Glen Ross
39.description: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

40.name: Braindead
40.description: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

41.name: Of Mice and Men
41.description: Two drifters, one a gentle but slow giant, try to make money working the fields during the Depression so they can fulfill their dreams.

42.name: The Lover
42.description: In 1929 French Indochina, a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man, each knowing that knowledge of their affair will bring drastic consequences to each other.

43.name: The Player
43.description: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

44.name: A River Runs Through It
44.description: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

45.name: Encino Man
45.description: When they find a frozen caveman in their back yard, two high school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.

46.name: Universal Soldier
46.description: Private Luc Deveraux and his sadistic sergeant, Andrew Scott, got killed in Vietnam. The army uses their bodies for a secret project - reanimating dead soldiers as deadly obedient cyborgs. However, their memories come back too.

47.name: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
47.description: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

48.name: Lethal Weapon 3
48.description: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

49.name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
49.description: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

50.name: Bad Lieutenant
50.description: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption.
